EmailTemplate.name: Pre-VMWorld inhouse mailing.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Dare to Chill: Free White Paper, Free Product, and Entry to Win VMWorld Pass
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Yep, all you need to do to enter to win a free pass to VMWorld is to download a white paper and/or the VMTurbo free trial. Download them both and gain two entries. Entry, White Paper, Product Trial– all free, free, free. You’ll be surprised at how relaxed and confident you feel when you have peace of mind that you virtualized datacenter is under control.
Just Click: White Paper Download <http://bit.ly/12s3rhT>: Find out how to reduce future infrastructure costs by 30% while improving customer satisfaction by addressing the significant gaps in the VMware vCloud solution offering.
Join the Action: Try VMTurbo <http://bit.ly/145okEW> in your environment absolutely free. Catch the wave with your license to chill.
The contest drawing will take place on Jul 26th.
Best regards,
The VMTurbo Team
